enquire_deliveries_by_scenario.name: Enquire Deliveries By Scenario
enquire_deliveries_by_scenario.description: Debugging assistant to show list of deliveries for each scenario, including default usage

data_description.template_path: Optional location where Jinja2 templates for HTML email are to be found
data_description.media_path: Storage path for media created during notifications, for example camera snapshots created for attachments
data_description.archive_path: Storage path for archived notifications, useful for debugging configuration, scenarios etc
